about_the_game:
Have you never worked in a bar? No problem - Frank has!
Help him serve craft beer to thirsty and picky clients, wash glasses, clean tables and keep everybody happy!
detailed_description:
Have you never worked in a bar? No problem - Frank has!
Help him serve craft beer to thirsty and picky clients, wash glasses, clean tables and keep everybody happy!
name: Another Bar Game Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3400 Series, Geforce 9400 Series with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4500 Series, Geforce 9400 GT or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: A casual action game where you serve craft beer to thirsty bar guests. Become the most popular bartender in town! Wash glasses, clean tables and keep everybody happy!
